attributes.action: Tell us why Russia puts young women who sing in churches in jail while our judiciary struggles hard not to put murderers in jail.
attributes.additional_details: There are thousands of people who have committed heinous crimes against the person and society roaming our streets, some of them on day release from some of our prisons.  Why is that, when other judiciaries seem quite able to protect their populations by keeping criminals in jail, we simply do not.  Do Russian politicians have more respect for their people than our politicians have for us, it seems very much like that and it is time the situation in this country was turned around.
